parts.text: {"word":"created","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"創造した、作り出した、生み出した","english_definition":"brought something into existence; made or invented something.","examples":[{"sentence":"God created the world.","translation":"神は世界を創造した。"},{"sentence":"She created a beautiful painting.","translation":"彼女は美しい絵を描いた。"},{"sentence":"The company created a new product.","translation":"その会社は新製品を開発した。"},{"sentence":"He created a website for his business.","translation":"彼は自分のビジネスのためにウェブサイトを作成した。"}],"collocations":["create a work of art (芸術作品を創造する)","create a new product (新製品を開発する)","create a website (ウェブサイトを作成する)","create an opportunity (機会を作り出す)","create a problem (問題を引き起こす)","create a character (キャラクターを作り出す)","create a company (会社を設立する)"],"synonyms":["make","form","generate","produce","design","invent","develop","originate","establish","initiate"],"antonyms":["destroy","demolish","annihilate","eliminate","erase","undo","abolish","terminate","ruin","neglect"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(役職・地位などを)新設した、創設した","english_definition":"":"established or brought into being a new role, position, or organization.","examples":[{"sentence":"The government created a new department to deal with environmental issues.","translation":"政府は環境問題に対処するために新しい省を創設した。"},{"sentence":"They created a new position for her in the company.","translation":"彼らは会社で彼女のために新しい役職を設けた。"}],"collocations":["create a department (部署を新設する)","create a position (役職を新設する)","create a committee (委員会を創設する)"],"synonyms":["establish","found","institute","form","set up","initiate"],"antonyms":["abolish","dissolve","eliminate","terminate"]}],"etymology":{"value":"「create」は、ラテン語の「creare」（生み出す、作る）に由来します。これは、インド・ヨーロッパ祖語の語根 *ker-（成長する）に関連しています。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/kriˈeɪtɪd/","syllables":"cre-a-ted"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["create","creates"],"past_simple":"created","past_participle":"created","present_participle":"creating"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**created**」は動詞「create」の過去形および過去分詞形です。「create」は、何か新しいものを存在させる、作り出す、または発明することを意味します。物理的なもの（絵画、製品）だけでなく、抽象的なもの（機会、問題）も作り出すことができます。また、新しい役職や組織を創設するという意味でも使用されます。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I have create a new website.","correct":"✓ I have created a new website.","note":"現在完了形を使う場合は、過去分詞形「created」を使う必要があります。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He is create a sculpture.","correct":"✓ He is creating a sculpture.","note":"進行形を使う場合は、現在分詞形「creating」を使う必要があります。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The world was create by God.","correct":"✓ The world was created by God.","note":"受動態を使う場合は、過去分詞形「created」を使う必要があります。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["create (動詞: 創造する)","creation (名詞: 創造、創造物)","creative (形容詞: 創造的な)","creativity (名詞: 創造性)","creator (名詞: 創造者)"],"idioms_phrases":["recreate (再創造する、再現する)","create a stir (騒ぎを起こす)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"高頻度 (High frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「**created**」は、何か新しいものを「作った」という意味の単語です。例えば、「The artist **created** a beautiful sculpture.（その芸術家は美しい彫刻を作った）」のように使います。これは「create」という動詞の過去形または過去分詞形です。過去の出来事を説明するときや、完了した行動について話すときに使います。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The artist **created** a stunning masterpiece.","translation":"その芸術家は素晴らしい傑作を創造した。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"創造した"},{"sentence":"The company **created** a new app to help people learn languages.","translation":"その会社は人々が言語を学ぶのを助けるための新しいアプリを開発した。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"作り出した"},{"sentence":"A new committee was **created** to address the issue.","translation":"その問題に対処するために新しい委員会が創設された。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"創設した"},{"sentence":"The author **created** a complex and fascinating character.","translation":"その作家は複雑で魅力的なキャラクターを作り出した。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"生み出した"}]}
